item.title: Cloudflare and Hugo
item.description: Hey hey! I got it to work! I’ll use this post to log what I had to do to get it to work. Motivation I wanted a site for my personal use. I started off with a full stack deployed on AWS, but when your trial runs out, you can get hit with a pretty hefty usage. That’s quite a bit of money for something that I really wanted as a note store.
